oai_dc:dc.dc:title: N.C. & S.L. Depot, Jackson, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man on crutches stands near a train depot on a clear day with a few clouds.

This depot is also listed as the N.C. & St. L. Depot, which stands for the Nashville, Chattanooga, and St. Louis Depot. It is located on 582 South Royal Street. The structure was built in 1907, and is listed on the National Register of Historical Places.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Railroad stations; Railroads
